name: slat
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a thin, narrow piece of wood, plastic, or metal used to make floors, furniture, window coverings, etc.: The base of the bed was made of slats.

Add to word list
Add to word list
a thin, narrow piece of wood, plastic, or metal used to make such things as floors, furniture, or window coverings: She closed the slats of the Venetian blinds.
